message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its immense value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,400,000. I'm confident this will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I am willing to pay $1,100,000 for the product.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  While $1,100,000 is a strong offer, I believe this product has the potential to bring you even greater returns. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. This is my best offer and reflects the true value of this unique opportunity.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I've done some further research and believe we can still reach an agreement. I am now willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product.
